    public class DefaultIndexManagerFactory
extends Object
implements IndexManagerFactory
    This is the default IndexManager implementation for Hibernate Search.

      • aliasToFQN

        protected String aliasToFQN(String implName)
        Provide a way to expand known aliases to fully qualified class names. As opposed to fromAlias(String) we can use this to expend to well known implementations which are optional on the classpath.
        Parameters:
        implName -
        Returns:
        the same name, or a fully qualified class name to use instead

      • fromAlias

        protected IndexManager fromAlias(String implName)
        Extension point: allow to override aliases or add new ones to directly create class instances.
        Parameters:
        implName - the requested alias
        Returns:
        null if the alias is unknown.
